pr_title: [fix-3835][ui] When the tenantName contains "<", the tenant drop-down list is blankadd verify tenant name cannot contain special characters.

timeline.message: add verify tenant name cannot contain special characters.

timeline.bodyText:
i think we should keep the front and back consistent, the api module should also limit the tenant name.
on the other hand, should we limit tenant name just 'number and character'?
timeline.author: lenboo
